\begin{cbstabular}{G{0.15\textwidth}L{0.3\textwidth}}
    \rowcolor{white}\cornercell{\textbf{Scorecategorie}} & \textbf{Eindscores}\\
    \grayhline
    \emph{Low} & lager dan 40 \\
    \emph{Medium} & 40 tot 60 \\
    \emph{High} & 60 tot 80 \\
    \emph{Very High} & hoger dan 80 \\
    \grayhline
\end{cbstabular}
